numlitem.para: System is deactivated and secured, and
En route or approach procedures do not require its use.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Operate TCAS in transponder-only mode by selecting TCAS Mode Selector to XPNDR position.
Flight Control to ensure TCAS is not required by Foreign States along planned route.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "TCAS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Deactivate the TCAS system by opening and collaring the P7 panel TCAS circuit breaker.
